column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Speaking of the curators
column2: they do an outstanding job of preserving objects
column4: and designing and redesigning entire wings. For example
column5: the Chinese and Japanese art section is being reworked now. Doubtless some of the scrolls need to be removed from the light
column6: but they will be replaced with other pieces. I am looking forward to viewing the wing when it reopens.
